model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: Did you play any Resident Evil this week?

MEMORY:
User Description: Speaker B is an individual who enjoys playing video games, particularly horror games like Resident Evil VIII. They also have an interest in hunting and have played Jurassic Park: World. Speaker B is eager to play games late at night and spends most of their free time gaming. They also enjoy golfing and plan to alternate between golfing and hunting with Speaker A.

Relationship Description: Speaker B and the robot have a close relationship, as they plan to play games together, with Speaker B teaching the robot how to hunt and the robot teaching Speaker B how to golf.

Event Description: Some shared events between Speaker B and the robot include playing Resident Evil VIII late at night, planning to play games and order pizza together, and the robot helping Speaker B get used to the UI of Resident Evil.
